display_long_description:
# Learn how to draw with Pencil!
Pencil! is a fun new way to learn how to draw! Overlay drawing guides on your physical paper to help you trace and follow along. By combining mixed-reality with a sheet of paper & a pencil, grow your art skills from complete beginner to master artist! 

![{"height":400,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974794_796057045987513_2008024649165496928_n.png?_nc_cat=107&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=gAY515DDsisQ7kNvgEabg4T&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCO-ZnSA-q1kQMcCKU8efX46FXMlwP5C1SGXzFNw1emzA&oe=66EE0FD9)
Be sure to join our **Discord** to share your art with the community and give us feedback: https://discord.gg/GpabPFTzDy
![{"height":300,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974833_464353966336396_6750467216746059287_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=LnQOn5nE30EQ7kNvgHyCgnv&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYC38QDI-YPnDBVyk0z7oBiRE210-2N7y-0_s1QzbwxK6g&oe=66EE1D60)
![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974631_926346679181546_3231541265199675309_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=KLhn_dvY540Q7kNvgF6wbVw&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYAaO9BFZiWccts_KniFd3Q07I56XzNaY9QMZizp6KCYxA&oe=66EE180F)
Pencil! teaches you how to draw by overlaying step-by-step guides on your piece of paper.
Learn fundamental concepts such as:
- Shape & Form
- Perspective
- Texture
- Anatomy
- & More!

![{"height":200,"type":"image","width":1280}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/38974833_870538868428823_1173830424327919644_n.png?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=5vmWxL0Y5zgQ7kNvgHPK7is&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYCZB-Vs3ubtvGroQjUOi5F8RuS9N3YT_VXYDnOdgZ5fiQ&oe=66EE1B16)
Create your own still-life composition with Free-draw mode. Drag and drop 3d and 2d models onto a stage that get projected onto your paper.
